content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:time="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/time/1.0/" xmlns:geo="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/geo/1.0/">   <!-- Administrative Details -->   <Contact>nsidc@nsidc.org</Contact>   <!--URL template for refreshing this file-->   <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset/NSIDC-0342/granule/description" />   <!-- URL Templates for ATOM results Granule Level Search -->   <!--via Dataset Parameters-->   <Url type="application/atom+xml" rel="results" indexOffset="1" pageOffset="1" template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset/NSIDC-0342/granule/?polarization={nsidc:polarization?}&dtstart={time:start?}&startIndex={startIndex:startIndex?}&dtend={time:end?}&projection={nsidc:projection?}&frequency={nsidc:frequency?}&itemsPerPage={itemsPerPage:count?}&pass={nsidc:pass?}" />   <!--with Polygon Geometry-->   <Url type="application/atom+xml" rel="results" indexOffset="1" pageOffset="1" template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset/NSIDC-0342/granule/?polarization={nsidc:polarization?}&dtstart={time:start?}&startIndex={startIndex:startIndex?}&dtend={time:end?}&projection={nsidc:projection?}&loc={geo:polygon?}&frequency={nsidc:frequency?}&itemsPerPage={itemsPerPage:count?}&pass={nsidc:pass?}" />   <!--with Bounding Box-->   <Url type="application/atom+xml" rel="results" indexOffset="1" pageOffset="1" template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset/NSIDC-0342/granule/?polarization={nsidc:polarization?}&dtstart={time:start?}&startIndex={startIndex:startIndex?}&dtend={time:end?}&bbox={geo:box?}&projection={nsidc:projection?}&frequency={nsidc:frequency?}&itemsPerPage={itemsPerPage:count?}&pass={nsidc:pass?}" />   <!--Available Parameters for Near-Real-Time DMSP SSM/I-SSMIS Pathfinder Daily EASE-Grid Brightness Temperatures-->   <Query xmlns:nsidc="http://nsidc.org/ns/opensearch/1.1/" role="nsidc:validparams" nsidc:projection="EASE-Grid Northern|EASE-Grid Southern" nsidc:pass="Ascending|Descending" nsidc:frequency="19GHz|22GHz|37GHz|91GHz" nsidc:polarization="Horizontal|Vertical" />   <!-- Control Parameters -->   <Attribution>(c) 2010 National Snow and Ice Data Center.</Attribution> </OpenSearchDescription>
